value:
Prince Alfonse and Princess
Sharena seem to be quite close.
I find that reassuring.

You know, my brother, Reinhardt, is
quite superb in battle.$k$pSome people even say he's the
second coming of one of our
world's greatest crusaders.

Are you curious about magic?
I have some knowledge in the
matter. I could train you.

My brother, Reinhardt, will continue
on his path—and me, on mine,
though it makes us enemies.

Children are a realm's treasure, and
all of them are adorable. In time, they
grow up to bear a realm's burdens.

My name is Olwen. I come
bearing greetings from
$Nf.

What great fortune! How
astonishing.

Good, though a far cry from
the gains my brother makes.

What? I'll never be able to live
this down.

I'll use this in battle to make you
proud.

My name is Olwen. Would you mind
if I join you? I would appreciate it
more than you could ever know.

My brother is a remarkable person.
He always helped and guided me.
When I was with him, I felt safe.$k$pBut the day came when I was
outside of his protection, and then
I had to find my own way in life.$k$pIt wasn't easy to take full responsibility
for myself. There were times when
the burden was too much for me.$k$pAfter joining you, I have seen how
you somehow find your answers,
even in the most uncertain of hours.$k$pYou inspire me. So I would be
honored to walk this path with you
for as long as you'll have me.
はっ！
せいっ！
きゃああっ！
How cowardly...
You scum!
No mercy!
I'll protect all who need it!
You won't get past me!
Not here...
huhu
I thank you deeply for giving me your time.
Aaah! Ha ha! I scare easily, I guess.
I'm sometimes at a loss about how to proceed.
Children should be happy. I will always fight to keep their smiles bright.
Where should I even begin, expressing my thoughts?
If ever my brother stands in my way? Well, I will do what I must.
I would like to fight on the side of good, for as long as goodness will have me.
OK.
Yes?
Onward.
